alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued January 27 at 6:54PM PST until January 28 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts to around 30 mph overnight then increasing again Friday morning with gusts 35 to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In Arizona, Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave and Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In California, San Bernardino County- Upper Colorado River Valley. In Nevada, Lake Mead National Recreation Area. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds overnight and on Friday are expected from Cottonwood Basin southward to south of Davis Dam. Gusts are expected to be lower across Boulder Basin, Virgin Basin, the Overton Arm, and Temple Basin. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and rough waves on area lakes will create hazardous conditions for small craft.
info.instruction: Boaters on area lakes should use extra caution since strong winds and rough waves can overturn small craft.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley
